name: peer
description: P2P File Sharing System peer program

scripts.generate-keys: openssl genpkey -algorithm RSA -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_bits:4096 -pkeyopt rsa_keygen_pubexp:3 -out keys/privateKey.pem && openssl pkey -in keys/privateKey.pem -out keys/publicKey.pem -pubout

author: Florentin Bekier & RÃ©mi Blaise
